params.newOfficiant: The address to be added as an officiant.

params.carvingId: The unique ID of the carving.
params.carvingProperties: Metadata for the carving (e.g., display styles).

params.officiant: The address to be removed from officiant roles.

params.carvingId: The unique ID of the carving to be removed from the gallery.

returns.galleryIds: The unique IDs of the carvings in the gallery.

params.carvingId: The unique ID of the carving to be publicized.
The unique ID of the carving.

returns.carvingProperties: Metadata for the carving (e.g., display styles).

params.carvingId: The unique ID of the carving to be removed.

carve(bytes32,string,string,string,bytes.notice: Stores a new carving in the contract.

constructor.notice: Assign deployer as the first officiant.

gallery(uint256).notice: Array to store public gallery carving IDs.

hide(bytes32).notice: Removes a carving from the public gallery.

officiants(address).notice: Mapping to manage officiant roles. Officiants can modify state.

peruse().notice: Retrieves the ids of carvings in the public gallery.

publicize(bytes32).notice: Adds a carving to the public gallery.

read(bytes32).notice: Retrieves a carving by its unique ID.

scratch(bytes32).notice: Removes a carving from the contract.
